title: New Champ Already?
body:
http://www.surrenderat20.net/2019/01/champion-teaser-visions-of-demacia.html

Looks like a champ who has golden chains, and when attached, can use the ults of the chained champion (Lux, Jarvan, Galio and Garen pics).

replies.body: I mean, sure, we see each of the champs and their ults being used, but the only indication of *who* is actually using them is in the Galio and Garen pictures, where it seems pretty clear that it's Galio/Garen who is using it. I'd be more inclined to think it's something along the lines of negating the ults (or perhaps all abilities/attacks) from the chained champ, or maybe some kind of "ability taunt" which forces the chained champ to target this champion with their abilities.
